update.description: Screentweetr Version 1.0: * First release! * Revised graphics and application icon. * Mac / Windows native OS integration improvements. * Added start monitor / stop monitor options to application dock menu. Version 0.9: * Added support for img.ly. * Added support for Posterous. * Fixed Mobypicture API problems. Version 0.8: * Added support for Mobypicture. * Added support for yFrog. * Added support for Twitgoo. * UI improvements - different message displayed in notification window when no image data is available. Version 0.7: * Added support for TweetPhoto. Version 0.6: * Expanded services to use TweetPhoto by default instead of TwitPic. Version 0.5: * Updated the settings screen to introduce more application options. * Added the start on login functionality to Screentweetr. Version 0.4.2: * Fixed a bug with the saving and loading of twitter credentials. Version 0.4.1: * Fixed a bug with the default notification window state. * Updated Mac graphics. Version 0.4: * Added a Welcome/Help screen to the application. * Twitter credentials are now encrypted. Version 0.3: * Added the ability to add messages and auto-post TwitPic tweets. * Improved behaviour on a Mac. Version 0.2: * Twitter password field does not show characters. * Uploads actually work first time around.
